name: hierdoc
description: Simple hierarchical document (eg for technical spec)

scripts.test: npx standard && npx tap --cov test*.js test/*.js
scripts.coveralls: export COVERALLS_REPO_TOKEN=$(cat $HOME/.coveralls-tokens/$npm_package_name); npx tap --cov test*.js test/*.js

author: Sandro Hawke (http://hawke.org/sandro)
